import './DetailsModal.css'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; function DetailsModal({transaction,closeDetails}) { const [editTransaction, setEditTransaction] = useState(transaction); function handleChange(ev,key){ let editTransactionCopy = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(transaction)); editTransactionCopy[key] = ev.target.value; setEditTransaction(editTransactionCopy); } return (
Transaction details
); } export default DetailsModal;
